dc.title: NIEM | National Information Exchange Model | NIEM.gov
dc.description: The NIEM Web site is designed to develop, disseminate and support enterprise-wide information exchange standards and processes that can enable jurisdictions to effectively share critical information in emergency situations, as well as support the day-to-day operations of agencies throughout the nation.
dc.subject: NIEM
National Information Exchange Model
information exchange standards
data exchange standards
